textAfterTable: 12 Songs Customer Reviews A Strong Album           by DCShaheen A very strong album from Martika, smart pop that developed upon her first album. It's a pity she didn't have more hits from this record because it definitely deserved a higher profile. Love Take Me To Forever, which I always thought should have been released instead of Martika's Kichen as a single. Not sure why this album didn't sell at the time, maybe it was the cover which was possibly to esoteric for Martika's teen fanbase? The real gem here is Coloured Kisses, which opens so brightly it always reminds me of a Summer's day. I thought this album would see Martika step up into the next level of stardom, always disappointed the rest of the world didn't agree. Cool Album!!           by pioneerr89 Now where're all the music videos ??? "Martika's Kitchen", "Love thy will be done" or "water" Martika
